website_summaries.verdict: The Saucony Omni 14 is a daily running shoe that has reliable components, high quality design and efficient performance. The shoe received positive feedback from users but there are also a few who are less satisfied with its tight fit and bulky look. The Omni 14 is a running shoe that’s meant for runners who need additional support in the arches.
pros: The upper is breathable because of the open mesh, according to some reviews
Most reviewers appreciated the securing mechanisms that were added here, including the Sauc-Fit system and the Heel Support Frame
The PWRGRID is a unit in the mid-sole that has shock attenuating properties
The SRC Impact Zone that runs from the heel to the midfoot offers shock absorption and a smoother step
Stability is received from the Dual Density SSL EVA, which has pronation control capabilities
A significant number of testers were satisfied with the shoe’s durable outsole
It is flexible as noted in some reviews
cons: Some runners felt that the 14th version of the Saucony Omni had a tighter toe box than the previous version
A few noted that the upper unit wasn’t very comfortable to the skin, so it became necessary to wear socks, which made the fit a bit too tight
The price of this shoe is slightly expensive
Some of the testers criticized its bulky look, which helped to diminish flexibility

customer_reviews.title: The first time I tried these on they felt like heaven on Earth
customer_reviews.text: The first time I tried these on they felt like heaven on Earth!!! I'm a pharmacist and stand 10+ hours a day. After wearing them for a week, they definitely have much better support than my previous sneakers. (That's why I bought them, supposed they are a 'top 10 support shoe for women') They sometimes make my feet sore across the top; loosening the laces have helped somewhat. My feet still ache some by the end of the day, but these shoes are definitely a huge improvement. I am now highly doubtful I will ever find a shoe I can stand in at work that will keep my feet pain free....
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors and comfy fit if you need arch support
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Sauconys almost exclusively for well over a decade and this is one of the more comfortable shoes of theirs I've had. I've worn most of their models and all price ranges, and this is one of my all time favorites. I ruptured my plantar facia last year and like a lot of arch support and cushion at the same time and this shoe offers both. No break in period necessary, comfortable right out of the box. Cute colors, will be getting the other colors soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Korte

customer_reviews.title: Saucony Omnis have been my favorite running shoes for over 10 years now
customer_reviews.text: Saucony Omnis have been my favorite running shoes for over 10 years now. They are fantastic for an overpronater (they are a stability shoe). They are also great for anyone with wider toes and average/narrow heels. The latter reason is why they are always, always my go-to shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Sam's Mom

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I love love LOVE these shoes! I have flat feet and the arch support in these is AMAZING! I do boot camps and a lot of outdoors exercising and these are awesome for that. My feet thank me every time I wear them!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Very Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I wear these almost every day to work. They are holding up well; I've had them for about 6 months now. I originally purchased them because the arch in my left foot was beginning to hurt. After wearing these shoes for a few weeks, the arch pain subsided.
customer_reviews.author: mslissap

customer_reviews.title: Flat feet and wider instep go with saucony guides instead
customer_reviews.text: The instep is smaller and the arches are way to too high....saucony guides are much more comfortable in my opinion. I would have returned then but I work in a factory and after one day in that they are so dirty I can't return them but I can't tell how comfortable shoes are until I start to work. Walking around at home is nothing like walking at work. So I'll bear with them and hope I can get my hundred dollars out of them before my feet say no more.
customer_reviews.author: sapphira

customer_reviews.title: The colors are wonderful and as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Yet another quality Saucony shoe. The colors are wonderful and as advertised. Good snug fit without being too tight. My heel doesn't slip while inside the shoe and I have no problem getting my foot in or out of the shoe. Very lightweight shoe. Excellent for runners, walkers, and people who need to walk/run around frequently with their jobs.
customer_reviews.author: kjpop

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and support
customer_reviews.text: still getting used to them....always wore Ryka, and thought I would try these (recommended by a friend). They are comfortable for walking, r treadmill, gym floor workouts. No more pain in my shins and knees since trying these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: A perfect Saucony Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I wear these shoes daily! I put approximately 10,000 steps per day on them and they work great! I wear them for work, at the gym and for my walking group. If you are a Saucony wearer, these shoes are absolutely what you would expect. I even wear them with my work pants.
customer_reviews.author: Cari P.

customer_reviews.title: I'm a former collegiate runner and have been running in ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a former collegiate runner and have been running in Saucony Omnis for 5 years. They provide just enough support for my high arches and hold up well to high mileage. I can usually get around 350 - 400 miles out of a pair before I have to replace them. They are similar to the Asics GT-2000 and Brooks Adrenaline in terms of support/cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: a.k.leo

customer_reviews.title: Loved it, but was defective
customer_reviews.text: I like the Saucony Omni 14. It gives good support for overpronation. However, the pair I received was defective. The seems came apart around the shoe string hole where the Saucony label was attached. I returned the shoes for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: T5901

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are an excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: I did have to add an arch support, but out of fairness, I need to with all of my shoes---other that Birkenstock! I wore these shoes to work, I work 12 hour shifts with a lot of walking. Feet weren't sore! These shoes are an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: suziQsedona

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable, but they don't seem to last too long ...
customer_reviews.text: After trying newer ones that really hurt my feet, I went back and bought this pair again for the 3rd time. They are comfortable, but they don't seem to last too long before breaking down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes if you have feet problems! I have horrible toes and these give me lots of support. They have a super thick sole which supports well! Great Shoe!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shana May

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but they squeak
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect shoes for my feet. I have fallen arches and finding good shoes are difficult. I had to drop one star bc of the major squeaking that occurs each step.
customer_reviews.author: Christina C

customer_reviews.title: It's been my go-to for a good 10 years
customer_reviews.text: Saucony Omni is the only fitness shoe I can buy without trying on. It's been my go-to for a good 10 years. Excellent comfort and stability.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Running shoes as I expected
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Saucony running shoes for 10 years, so I know that I need to order up a size. Knowing that, they did fit as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana's Mom

customer_reviews.title: ... me longer than I expected and are still in great shape even after a year or so of wearing ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have lasted me longer than I expected and are still in great shape even after a year or so of wearing them. They colors also stay pretty vibrant, so they really do look great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only shoe that works for me after my knee surgery ...
customer_reviews.text: Only shoe that works for me after my knee surgery. Provides stability and comfort. I can do light trail running with these. Something I wasn't able to do before.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: I love that I can find past year models on Amazon ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased the Saucony Omni for my running shoe since I began running years ago and tried on many, many styles. I love that I can find past year models on Amazon for less--as I am not particular on the color--just the make and model!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Sallee

customer_reviews.title: Super narrow. Maybe great for other feet
customer_reviews.text: Super narrow. Maybe great for other feet, but hurt mine.
customer_reviews.author: Gita

customer_reviews.title: Saucony Omni
customer_reviews.text: a little bit heavier then my asics but gives good support while running
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great ankle stability and arch support.
customer_reviews.text: I wear these for walking 2-3 miles on mixed gravel path, sidewalk and desert. Great ankle stability and arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda E.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my flat foot and over pronation
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Omni 14. Perfect fit for my flat foot / fallen arch and over pronation. Love this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Love OMNI 14
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are perfect if you need arch support. They're great for plantar fasciitis flares!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered because these were recommended for bunions
customer_reviews.text: I ordered because these were recommended for bunions, but I've walked three times in them so far and there is still bunion pain and pressure. Maybe after wearing them more, it won't hurt as much.
customer_reviews.author: Terri L. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great price on running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes so far. They are lightweight but provide excellent support.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Needed supportive cushioned sneakers, they are the best I've ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely good heel cushioning. One of my favorite Saucony shoes to date.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only shoe I'll wair but I can't find a women's 12 med in the omni 14 anymore. What other shoe is comparable?
customer_reviews.author: Robert Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love this Saucony Shoe, very comfortable and love the colors.
customer_reviews.author: marion gault

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits better then the new Omni 15. Wish they still made these shoes the same.
customer_reviews.author: Pre$

customer_reviews.title: Cloud Saucony!
customer_reviews.text: It feels like I'm running on clouds. If I were in advertising, the tag line would be: "I have to look down to make sure I'm on the ground!"
customer_reviews.author: hockeyhippie

customer_reviews.title: Runs bug. Get 1/2 size smaller. I'm on ...
customer_reviews.text: Runs bug. Get 1/2 size smaller. I'm on my feet all day at work. After an ankle injury, these shoes were a blessing!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I have 3 pairs of this style right now and one in the past.
customer_reviews.author: marlene

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The perfect running shoe. Great for wider feet and folks who need stability.
customer_reviews.author: APC

customer_reviews.title: but around the house they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn them for a run yet, but around the house they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers. They give me great arch support and are great for walking. Will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: foofoo60

customer_reviews.title: Buy 1/2 size larger
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear a 7 and always need a 7.5 with Saucony!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Ok shoe, was better in the past
customer_reviews.text: Been buying this shoe for at least 10 years. Wish they would leave the design the same. Every new year they tweak it and you don't know what to expect. This version seems fine, except they are using flimsier material for the top mesh. My toe poked through after not that many runs. Sadly other manufacturers are doing this too, I've seen friends in different brands have the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: injuredrunner

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shoe. My feet are extremely flat and this is the only running shoe I buy. I had previously bought the Omni 12 and 13 and am very pleased with the 14 so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit and Good for Running
customer_reviews.text: I was having knee pain with my past running shoes and these have helped minimize the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H. P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: One of the few athletic shoes I can wear that are comfortable and have good arch and foot support.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Wolslegel

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have severe bunions and these shoes offer excellent support and keep my feet from hurting.
customer_reviews.author: S Reitzug

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Always get the same shoes but now went up a half size
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the sneakers, very very comfortable and offer great support.
customer_reviews.author: Dc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are like heaven on my feet. I have two pair.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: good arch support - pronation support
customer_reviews.text: I get shin splints without good foot support and these really help!
customer_reviews.author: tasha

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my preteen son who needed more supportive ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my preteen son who needed more supportive shoes (but doesn't fit into men's shoes yet) on recommendation of podiatrist. He wears them daily. Custom orthotic inserts fit well into the shoes and now we have fewer complaints of foot and knee pain.
customer_reviews.author: JC

product_meta.title: Saucony Omni 14 Women's Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Saucony Women's Omni 14 Excellent cushioning and robust support, all while maintaining flexibility. Runners will love the plush cushioning and support provided by the New Omni 14, Saucony's solution for runners with moderate-to-high pronation issues. Holding onto many key features of its best selling predecessor, The updated Saucony Omni 14 Running Shoe is designed for over pronators seeking a light, flexible ride without sacrificing cushioning and support. Full-length POWERGRID creates an exceptionally smooth cushioned ride; while no sew overlays in the forefoot enhance flexibility and reduce hot spots, while keeping the upper structure secure. SAUC-FIT - Upper The redesigned upper of the shoe is all about stability combining the ARCH-LOCK and SAUC-FIT system for a snug supportive fit, with the Support Frame that locks down the heel and gives enhanced medial support throughout the gait cycle. The continued addition of RunDry interior lining, transports sweat away from the body, removing it into the air ensuring you remain comfortable and dry. Blended with a HydraMAX collar lining, supplementing wicking technology already distributed, the air mesh upper then proceeds to promote airflow. PowerGrid - Midsole Taking all the force from the midsole, PowerGrid provides an even smoother transitions with enhanced heel to toe cushioning whilst the Dual density SSL EVA maximises rebound and durability whilst minimising weight. Promoting comfort the SRC (Super Rebound Cushioning) Impact Zone provides shock attenuation and sets the foot up for a smooth transition, reducing pressures on the underfoot and enhancing forward propulsion. Injection Blown - Outsole Lastly on the outer, Injection Blown Rubber (iBR+) combines Sauconys' proprietary compound with a manufacturing process that results in less waste and better resilience; concurring with a liquid mould, producing higher consistency and durability for supreme cushioning underfoot. A XT-900 Carbon element offers e
feature_bullets: ** NEW **Redesigned Upper - Redesigned upper that features SAUC-FIT system for enhanced medial support and a locked down feel.
** NEW ** RunDry - An interior lining that wicks away moisture.
ComfortLite Sockliner - To provide more support and comfort in the arch and cups for an improved fit and feel.
Fully Decoupled SRC Crashpad - For increased support and a better transition.

Full Length PowerGrid - 30% more durable cushioning with 15% less weight. Powerfoam material is combined with powerful GRID technology which helps stabilise the foot, absorb impact stress and offers a smooth and cushioned ride.
